name: Can't Sleep 🧠 💭 🛌
description:
Squash the bad thoughts and empty the brain to fall asleep before you alarm goes off.

Click the thoughts to "squash" them. The brain will empty over time if you keep the thoughts from reaching it. If the alarm clock reaches 6:00 am you'll be forced to wake up and the game will end.

------

I made this game in approximately 2 hours when I couldn't sleep. I may "finish" it one day, but probably not.
